levels.details: The queue manager process has been restored to normal operation.

Monit has detected that the local queue manager process has failed. A restart will automatically be attempted. If this alarm does not clear, the queue manager process may have been stopped or an unrecoverable failure may have occurred.

levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration is now consistent across the deployment.
levels.details: All shared configuration has been synchronised across the deployment.

levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration is being synchronised across the cluster.
levels.details: Shared configuration is being synchronised across the cluster. This involves restarting the clearwater processes on individual nodes.

levels.description: etcd: A node has failed to start successfully after receiving new shared configuration
levels.details: A node has failed to start successfully after receiving new shared configuration. Check that the shared configuration is valid, and the node is alive.

levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration has been learned by the local node.
levels.details: All shared configuration has been synchronised to the local node.

levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration is being synchronised on this node.
levels.details: Shared configuration is being synchronised on this node. This involves restarting the clearwater processes on this node.

levels.description: etcd: This node has failed to start successfully after receiving new shared configuration
levels.details: This node has failed to start successfully after receiving new shared configuration. Check that the shared configuration is valid, and this node is alive.
